text: I agree with respect to how they did the cards to some degree. I do like the color choices, menu, etc.
I've got an issue with embedded youtube videos not displaying correctly in a portal (collapsed height). Anyone know how the hs-responsive-embed classes are supposed to handle this?

Thanks, found this article. Thought it was already in the default css because it worked as intended in other portals but now I've fixed it. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-pages-editor/how-do-i-make-my-embedded-youtube-video-responsive>
you have to fix it in HubSpot. they swear its fine but it is broke.
Hi, anyone has issues to resend registration email or reset password in a lead?
whats the issue you are seeing?
Don't send email
could you link me to the contact you are trying to resend this for?
How could link the contact?
copy & paste the url in a DM to me
Has anyone used the Blog Private Content setting before using Lists?
we are having issues where the Lists being attached to the Private blog, no registration email are being sent to contact list
is there a connected domain for the blog?
We created a Test portal seeing how the Private Content functionality would work
it does not have a specific connect domain just the default HS domain
Right, so the registration emails are only sent if the restricted content is hosted on an external domain
so if I created a subdomain under the primary connect domain, and pointed that to our HubSpot paid portal, then the Registration email would be sent?
as long as the restricted blog is hosted under that domain, it will send the emails

Hi <@U3T21PDBK> my name is Cameron nice to meet you!

Would you mind linking the page and template where you are seeing this occur?
can Test portals get sub-domains connected them, or does the potal have to be paid
where is it
Is it just me or does the ability to favorite templates not exist here:
I though there use to be something when you hovered over that gave you the ability to favorite them
Possible to have blog link in header automatically go to latest blog post (no list page)?
I, anyone know how I can make a button logout on page private?
you could probably do this with the recent posts function and just pull back the single latest post
Awesome, thank you. Going to try that. May have to create a redirect page since I can't use HUBL in the navigation blocks.

There is a menu function now that gives you more flexibility when creating menus, you may be able to add it in there when using that, though it may require you recreating your menu, one sec and ill get you the link to the function
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/en/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-functions#menu>
That does get me in the right direction, thank you!

can any HubSpotters explain how `{{ caller() }}` works?
<https://github.com/TheWebTech/CrankShaft/blob/8db89c798cd515a54fb56b83f562593985fbfed1/CrankShaft/code/hubl/theme-macros.css#L765-L785>

it seems to me that it enables you to make macros that operate in block syntax but I have no idea what thatâd look like
link them to `/_hcms/mem/logout`
thank you

With the output:
```<div class="whatever">
  This will appear where "caller()" is.
</div>```
